page.title: 08A CHURCH IN COVE
page.content: This church belongs to the Church of England and was built in{1844}on a small green hill.In a private house outside the church at this time a lady held prayer meetings for the young.She found that the children could not read or write and so she began a {Dame {School. In the parish about {160}people worship God regularly each week,{280} people in all attend the church at different intervals during the week. The{Rector}has been at the church for four and a half years,he sees it as his job to bring the word of{Jesus and {God}to the people. The {Rector}was a diamond miner in { {South Africa},he says{"I believed in {God but I didn't know God.God appeared {to me and told me to bring other {people to him." {}
